body:

title: Should I buy Gold?

replies.body:
It's not worth it in my honest opinion.

I mainly bought it for /surface(emerald), /join(gold), and to support the server. But it's your decision.
replies.body_tagged:
It's not worth it in my honest opinion.

I mainly bought it for /surface(emerald), /join(gold), and to support the server. But it's your decision.

replies.body: I'm guessing gold had /surface in mczone? since that is emerald right now o.o

I really like to /join *team* with my friends :D
It's up to you, but if you have lots of friends, I would recommend it (:

replies.body:
It depends. If you want to help support the server, its really grateful that you donatd to help the server. If its because of the perks, dont donate at all cause it kills the purpose of donating.

Its your call man :)
